title: From the Vault: "Fuzz" with Mary Roach
itunes:title: From the Vault: "Fuzz" with Mary Roach
description:
In this episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe welcome acclaimed science writer Mary Roach back to the show to discuss her new book "Fuzz: When Nature Breaks the Law." (originally published 09/14/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
